item.title: Vim Cheat Sheet
item.description: Global :h keyword - open help for keyword :ter - open terminal Cursor movement h - move cursor left j - move cursor down k - move cursor up l - move cursor right H - move to top of screen M - move to middle of screen L - move to bottom of screen w - jump forwards to the start of a word W - jump forwards to the start of a word (words can contain punctuation)
